page.title: 16LANDSCAPE,SAUNDERSFOOT.
page.content: There are a number of old buildings in Saundersfoot namely Netherwood,The Old Cottage,Coedrath,Hean Castle and Bonvilles Court.Of these{Netherwood,}{ the oldest of the buildings,185 years old is now a school.{The Old Cottage} was originally the Jail House, complete with cells,although we are told the only occupants ever, were two drunks some years ago.{Hean Castle and{Bonvilles Court}are the only ones which have kept to their original use of private dwellings,both formerly belonging to mine owners.{Hean Castle} is a large estate of some 1200 acres, mostly farmland,with 380 acres wood- land.The estate owns 3 caravan sites & a carpark{.Bonvilles Court}has been lavishly modernised and extended in a tasteful way keeping to its original style.{Coedrath}is now an hotel with a beautiful view to Monkstone Point.
